adrFormatAddress: 1651 3rd Ave #205, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Daniel Solaque was our tech that serviced our facility. He did an AMAZING job getting one of our 20+ year old treadmills running like brand new again. He always goes above and beyond when providing preventative maintenance to our equipment. Great customer service, courteous and very knowledgeable! We can always depend on him to get our facility up and running.

text.text: Daniel Solaque was our tech that serviced our facility. He did an AMAZING job getting one of our 20+ year old treadmills running like brand new again. He always goes above and beyond when providing preventative maintenance to our equipment. Great customer service, courteous and very knowledgeable! We can always depend on him to get our facility up and running.

originalText.text:
We have a very old HealthRider S150 which would stop by itself at any time.  We could immediately start it but again it would stop.  Then it might run for twenty minutes.  I hated the thought of sending this big machine to a landfill so I emailed HealthRider and asked for help.  Icon, as they are now called, said that they can send a technician to diagnose the problem but cautioned that parts may not be available to fix it.  The fee for Non-Warranty service was modest so I agreed.

Some weeks later, Dave from Fitness Machine Technicians arrived.  He took the hood off the machine and found nothing out of order.  The machine now ran normally without stopping.  He noted that the machine was plugged into non-grounded outlet and did not have its own circuit, as required. Our apartment building is 102 years old and all outlets are only two pronged. I grounded the plug.  Dave asked if I ever lubricated the machine.  I thought he meant lubricating the bearings and I replied no.  He said the belt has the greatest friction and he used a spray can with a long tube to lubricate the underside of the belt.

Dave's diagnosis was that, lacking a separate circuit, perhaps fluctuating loads from other sources on the same circuit could be the cause of the intermittent stoppages.  He carefully vacuumed the machine, left me a can of silicone spray, tidied up and left.

I think Dave's diagnosis was right.  I use the treadmill now only when no kitchen or laundry appliances are in use, and in the daytime when lights are not on.  Our machine keeps running.  Thanks Dave, for keeping it from some landfill.

originalText.text: Excellent service and quality work. Our technician showed up promptly on time, with a text heads up before his arrival. The work was exactly what was promised. The fees were in line with what was provided before the work was done. I highly recommend this company for anyone needing installation or servicing on fitness equipment.

text.text: Excellent service and quality work. Our technician showed up promptly on time, with a text heads up before his arrival. The work was exactly what was promised. The fees were in line with what was provided before the work was done. I highly recommend this company for anyone needing installation or servicing on fitness equipment.

originalText.text: From scheduling to getting our equipment fixed Fitness Machine Technicians were professional, polite, and a pleasure to work with. Great communication from the admin staff on scheduling and the technician was on time and completed the repairs quickly. I highly recommend them if you need any gym equipment fixed!

text.text: From scheduling to getting our equipment fixed Fitness Machine Technicians were professional, polite, and a pleasure to work with. Great communication from the admin staff on scheduling and the technician was on time and completed the repairs quickly. I highly recommend them if you need any gym equipment fixed!

originalText.text: I could not recommend Fitness Machine Technicians more highly!!!! I contacted them when I was in a bind and needed service on an elliptical that I’d purchased within a very narrow time frame.  They could not have been more responsive or accommodating - which is truly rare in this industry.  They also delivered impeccable service and were truly just an overall delight to work with.  I’d go back to them with any similar issues going forward!
